remarks: Line exchange property (compare ~ cvlatexchb2 for atoms).  (Contributed by NM, 17-Nov-2012.)
statement:
llnexch.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
llnexch.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
llnexch.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
llnexch.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
llnexch.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
llnexchb2 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( X e. N /\ Y e. N /\ Z e. N ) /\ ( ( X ./\ Y ) e. A /\ X =/= Z ) ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) .<_ Z <-> ( X ./\ Y ) = ( X ./\ Z ) ) ) $.
